Rebrand to Magic Box Project with comprehensive documentation

Vision: Deliver the ultimate audio experience to all headphone users
- Simple UX: Connect box â†’ Configure via Web UI â†’ Perfect sound

Documentation updates:

- GEMINI.md: Updated to 2M-tap specs and Magic Box concept

New documentation:
- docs/roadmap.md: 3-phase development roadmap with detailed tasks
- docs/architecture/overview.md: System design, data flow, ZeroMQ specs

Folder restructure:
- docs/reports/: Phase implementation reports
- docs/investigations/: Analysis and investigation logs

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Comprehensive roadmap update with OPRA, Legal, and Infrastructure

Major changes:
- Switch from oratory1990 to OPRA Project (CC BY-SA 4.0)
  - oratory1990 data prohibits commercial use
  - OPRA allows commercial use with attribution

Added sections to docs/roadmap.md:
- Legal & License Management
  - EQ data source licenses (OPRA vs oratory1990)
  - Dependency library licenses (LGPL handling)
  - Required tasks: license audit, attribution files
- Infrastructure & Quality
  - CI/CD (GitHub Actions)
  - Testing (C++/Python unit tests, E2E)
  - Documentation (user guide, API docs)
  - Deployment automation

Phase updates:
- Phase 1: Added logging, error handling tasks
- Phase 2: OPRA integration, dependencies to add
- Phase 3: Detailed Jetson migration tasks

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
